data.text: Dawuda xa bɛɛti bɛɛtibae xa mangɛ bɛ
Ɲɛlɛxinyi na mixi bɛ naxan hinnɛma tɔɔrɔmixi ra.
Alatala a ratangama nɛ, a a rabalo.
Alatala a malima nɛ a fura tɛmui, a a rayalan.
N yaxuie wɔyɛn ɲaaxie falama, e naxɛ,
Naxan fama n xɛɛbude a filankafui wɔyɛnyi falama.
N xɔnmixie n ma fe makɔlikɔlima e boore bɛ,
E naxɛ, «Fure ɲaaxi bara a suxu,
Hali n dɛfanboore, n nu laxi naxan na,
Alatala, hinnɛ n na, i xa n nakeli,
N a kolon n nafan i ma,
I n malima nɛ barima n tinxin.
Tantui na Isirayila Marigi Alatala bɛ abadan.
